title: Why do people do this ? These hooligans just beat whoever they want to for no reason
selftext: This has happened to a very close friend of mine the one in the yellow shirt.His name is Vishal chaudhary he studies with me at VMC in nsp,delhi. These people have been attacked for no reason other than just to scare them into  letting go off their land disputes
